name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans 2
overview: With Slaps And Beans 2 we’re ready to take you on a brand-new adventure, together with Bud Spencer and Terence Hill. The new episode includes many features: more challenging enemies, new locations and more original soundtracks directly from the movies! In addition, the combat system has been improved, the pixel art graphics are more detailed and we have added new play modes, with a solo/coop story mode and a party game mode for up to 4 players.
